name: rule-of-three
title: Rule of Three
description: Calculate proportions using the rule of three (cross multiplication)
author: yaya12085

commands.name: index
commands.title: Rule of Three
commands.subtitle: Cross Multiplication
commands.description: Calculate X in the proportion: A is to B as C is to X

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
